project.name: C-C785B-FFMP-10-ST01-DT01-DF12-CF19-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C785B-FFMP-10-ST01-DT01-DF12-CF19-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Has a buffer declared on the heap. malloc(20*sizeOf(char)) If input is resolved to more than 20 chars it will overflow
